sentences.sContent: His policy is to ingratiate himself with anyone who might be useful to him.
sentences.sCn: 他的为人之道是巴结任何可能对他有用的人。

remMethod.val: in(使) + grat(感激) + iate → 使别人感激自己 → 讨别人欢心 → 讨好

words.tran: 逢迎的，讨好的；迷人的，吸引人的

trans.tranOther: to try very hard to get someone’s approval – used to show disapproval
